Chile: The Antonio de Vea expedition departs from Chiloé to explore the fjords and channels of Patagonia.
Colombia: Foundation of Medellín by Francisco Herrera Campuzano
India: Guru Tegh Bahadur, the ninth Guru of Sikhs is executed in Delhi by the order of Aurangzeb for his support for the Kashmiri Hindus to practice their religion.Guru Gobind Singh becomes tenth Guru of Sikhs.
Malta: A plague epidemic begins, killing around 11,300 people until its end in August 1676.
Spain: Charles II of Spain, the last Habsburg ruler of the Spanish Empire, was crowned.
Sweden: Denmark invades Scania, triggering Scanian War
